text: was a Japanese professional wrestler better known as Mr. Saito or . He wrestled for several years in many promotions owned by the National Wrestling Alliance (NWA). He was born in Tokyo. He later joined the World Wrestling Federation (WWF), where he teamed with Mr. Fuji to hold the World Tag Team Championship twice. He also won the AWA World Heavyweight Championship in 1990. In Japan, Saito wrestled for both All Japan Pro Wrestling and New Japan Pro Wrestling. In 2000, Saito was diagnosed with Parkinson's disease. He died of complications from the disease in Tokyo at the age of 76.マサ斎藤さんが死去 アントニオ猪木氏と巌流島で死闘 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Japan Category:Japanese professional wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling promoters Category:Sportspeople from Tokyo
title: Masa Saito
